mapper.select: select partner.id,partner.name from biz_area_rela_partner biz_area_rela_partner left join partner partner on biz_area_rela_partner.partner_id = partner.id where biz_area_id = #{bizAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into biz_area_rela_partner (biz_area_id, partner_id, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{bizAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partnerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into biz_area_rela_partner
biz_area_id,
partner_id,
gmt_create,
gmt_modify,
